snippet: If Republicans on Capitol Hill agree to revenue increases, the job-killing sequester could finally be lifted.
abstract: Editorial contends if Republicans in Congress agree to revenue increases in budget negotiations, then the job-killing sequester could be eased or eliminated; laments agreement to set the economy on a promising course with new investments is impossible, given Republicans' insistence on austerity.
lead_paragraph: If Republicans on Capitol Hill agree to revenue increases, the job-killing sequester could finally be lifted.

headline.main: New Chance for a Budget Compromise
headline.print_headline: New Chance for a Budget Compromise
